title: Andy Crewdson
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614032512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Writers](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614032512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writers) : Andy Crewdson**

Andy Crewdson is a type historian and critic ( [perhaps from Bethesda, Maryland](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614032512/http:/typophile.com/node/40358)) who studied history at UC Berkeley, and more recently in Washington, DC. Crewdson created the popular blog [Lines and Splines](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614032512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lines%20and%20Splines) and later replaced it with [New Series](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614032512/http:/typophile.com/wiki/New%20Series). He has been noticeably absent from typographic discussion and publishing since 2003, a fact bemoaned almost yearly with cries of "Whatever happened to Andy Crewdson?" on all the type blogs and forums.
